institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
contents: Article 19 (Objection Procedure) ① An instructor or athlete may file an objection regarding matters subject to objection in Article 18 by filling out Appendix No. 53. ② The chief examiner shall respond to the objection in Paragraph 1. Action will be taken verbally or in writing (Form No. 54) in consultation with the judges, and an instructor or instructor who, despite the result of the action, raises objections on the same issue more than twice or engages in actions that interfere with the progress of the game After warning the athlete that a request for disposition will be made to the Ethics Committee, a request for disposition may be made to the Ethics Committee (Form No. 13). ③ In case of dissatisfaction with the response to the objection in paragraph 2, the secretary-general of the city/provincial committee shall submit the request to the Korean Committee for national competitions, and the head of the participating athlete or the person in charge of the participating athlete's affiliated institution shall submit the submission to the city/provincial committee for national competitions, along with supporting materials proving the objection. You can file an objection according to Form No. 53-1. Revised April 9, 2019, ④ When requesting the formation of an objection processing committee pursuant to paragraph 3, objections to the competition execution process or evaluation and scoring process shall be filed immediately when a situation arises, and objections to the evaluation and scoring results shall be submitted to the provisional scoring results. Applications must be made within 3 hours of the presentation. However, when calculating time, the time elapsed from 22:00 to 08:00 is not included. Revised April 9, 2019, ⑤ After receiving the objection documents, the Korean Commission shall form an objection deliberation committee composed of the technical (deputy) chairperson and division heads to decide whether the objection is subject to deliberation. In this case, a decision is made with the attendance of a majority of registered members and the approval of a majority of members present. Newly established on April 9, 2019, ⑥ Any objection submitted beyond the objection time limit will be dismissed. Newly established 2019. 4. 9.
